meaningMnemonic: The <radical>woman</radical> <radical>servant</radical> is the lower ranking <kanji>princess</kanji>. The queen is no servant. Hecks no. Just the princess, because she's a servant to what her parents tell her to do.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>princess</kanji> goes on to do whatever she wants. She tells the real servants, "Don't tell my daddy, the king, I did this. <reading>He may</reading> (ひめ) not like it."
